Package jsymbolic2.features

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcousticGuitarPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all Note Ons played by acoustic guitar instruments (General MIDI patches 25 and 26).
    AmountOfArpeggiationFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are repeated notes, minor thirds, major thirds, perfect fifths, minor sevenths, major sevenths, octaves, minor tenths or major tenths.
    AmountOfStaccatoFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of notes with a duration less than 0.1 seconds, divided by the total number of notes in the piece.
    AverageIntervalSpannedByMelodicArcs
    A feature calculator that finds the average melodic interval (in semitones) separating the top note of melodic peaks and the bottom note of adjacent melodic troughs.
    AverageLengthOfMelodicArcsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average number of notes that separate melodic peaks and troughs.
    AverageNoteDurationFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average duration of notes (in seconds).
    AverageNoteToNoteChangeInDynamics
    A feature calculator that finds the average change of loudness from one note to the next note in the same MIDI channel.
    AverageNumberOfIndependentVoicesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average number of different channels in which notes are sounded simultaneously.
    AverageNumberOfSimultaneousPitchClassesFeature
    A feature extractor that finds the average number of different pitch classes sounding simultaneously.
    AverageNumberOfSimultaneousPitchesFeature
    A feature extractor that finds the average number of pitches sounding simultaneously.
    AverageRangeOfGlissandosFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average range of MIDI Pitch Bends, where "range" is defined as the greatest value of the absolute difference between 64 and the second data byte of all MIDI Pitch Bend messages falling between the Note On and Note Off messages of any note in the piece.
    AverageRestFractionAcrossVoicesFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates the fraction of the duration of each MIDI channel during which no note is sounding on that channel, averaged across all channels that contain at least one note.
    AverageTimeBetweenAttacksFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average time (in seconds) between Note On events (regardless of MIDI channel).
    AverageTimeBetweenAttacksForEachVoiceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average of the individual channel averages of time (in seconds) between Note On events in each given MIDI channel.
    AverageVariabilityOfTimeBetweenAttacksForEachVoiceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average of the standard deviations (in seconds) of each individual MIDI channel's time between Note On events.
    BasicPitchHistogramFeature
    A feature vector consisting of bin magnitudes of the basic pitch histogram described in the jSymbolic manual.
    BeatHistogramFeature
    A feature extractor that calculates a feature vector consisting of the bin magnitudes of the beat histogram described in the jSymbolic manual.
    BeatHistogramTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature extractor that calculates a feature vector consisting of the bin magnitudes of the beat histogram described in the jSymbolic manual.
    BrassPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all Note Ons played by brass instruments, including saxophones (General MIDI patches 57 to 68).
    ChordDurationFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average duration a chord in units of time corresponding to the duration of an idealized quarter note.
    ChordTypeHistogramFeature
    A feature vector consisting of bin magnitudes of the chord type histogram described in the jSymbolic manual.
    ChromaticMotionFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that correspond to a semitone.
    CombinedStrengthOfTwoStrongestRhythmicPulsesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the sum of the magnitudes of the two beat histogram peaks with the highest magnitudes.
    CombinedStrengthOfTwoStrongestRhythmicPulsesTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the sum of the magnitudes of the two tempo-standardized beat histogram peaks with the highest magnitudes.
    CompleteRestsFractionFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of the music during which no pitched notes are sounding on any MIDI channel.
    ComplexChordsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all simultaneously sounding pitch groups that contain more that four pitch classes.
    ComplexInitialMeterFeature
    A feature calculator that is set to 1 if the initial meter is a standard complex meter (i.e.
    CompoundMeterFeature
    A feature calculator that is set to 1 if the initial meter is a standard compound meter (i.e.
    ContraryMotionFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction fraction of movements between voices that consist of contrary motion (the fraction is calculated relative to the total amount of qualifying transitions, including all parallel, similar, contrary and oblique transitions).
    DifferenceBetweenMostCommonRhythmicValuesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds a measure of the difference between the two most common rhythmic values in the music.
    DiminishedAndAugmentedTriadsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all simultaneously sounding pitch groups that are either diminished or augmented triads.
    DirectionOfMelodicMotionFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are rising in pitch.
    DistanceBetweenMostPrevalentMelodicIntervalsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the absolute value of the difference (in semitones) between the most common and second most common melodic intervals in the piece.
    DistanceBetweenTwoMostCommonVerticalIntervalsFeature
    The interval in semitones between the wrapped vertical interval histogram bins with the two most common vertical intervals.
    DominantSeventhChordsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all simultaneously sounding pitch groups that are dominant seventh chords.
    DominantSpreadFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the largest number of consecutive pitch classes separated by perfect 5ths that each individually account for at least 9% of the total notes in the piece.
    DupleInitialMeterFeature
    A feature calculator that is set to 1 if the initial meter is a standard simple or compound duple meter (i.e.
    DurationInSecondsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the total duration (in seconds) of the piece.
    DynamicRangeFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the loudness of the loudest note in the piece, minus the loudness of the softest note.
    ElectricGuitarPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all Note Ons played by electric guitar instruments (General MIDI patches 27 to 32).
    ElectricInstrumentPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all Note Ons played by electric non-"synth" instruments (General MIDI patches 5, 6, 17, 19, 27 to 32, 34 to 40).
    FirstPitchClassFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the pitch class of the first note in the piece.
    FirstPitchFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the MIDI pitch value of the first note in the piece.
    FoldedFifthsPitchClassHistogramFeature
    A feature vector consisting of bin magnitudes of the folded fifths pitch class histogram described in the jSymbolic manual.
    GlissandoPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of pitched MIDI Note Ons that have at least one MIDI Pitch Bend associated with them, divided by the total number of pitched Note Ons in the piece.
    HarmonicityOfTwoStrongestRhythmicPulsesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the bin index of the higher (in terms of bin index) of the two beat histogram peaks with the highest magnitude, divided by the index of the lower (in terms of bin index) of the two bins.
    HarmonicityOfTwoStrongestRhythmicPulsesTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the bin index of the higher (in terms of bin index) of the two tempo-standardized beat histogram peaks with the highest magnitude, divided by the index of the lower (in terms of bin index) of the two bins.
    ImportanceOfBassRegisterFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of notes between MIDI pitches 0 and 54.
    ImportanceOfHighRegisterFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of notes between MIDI pitches 73 and 127.
    ImportanceOfLoudestVoiceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the difference between the average loudness (MIDI velocity) of the loudest channel and the average loudness of the other channels that contain at least one note.
    ImportanceOfMiddleRegisterFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of notes between MIDI pitches 55 and 72.
    InitialTempoFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the tempo in beats per minute at the start of the piece.
    InitialTimeSignatureFeature
    A feature vector consisting of two values.
    IntervalBetweenMostPrevalentPitchClassesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the absolute value of the difference (in semitones) between the pitches of the two most frequently occurring pitch classes.
    IntervalBetweenMostPrevalenttPitchesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the absolute value of the difference (in semitones) between the pitches of the two most frequently occurring pitches.
    LastPitchClassFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the pitch class of the last note in the piece.
    LastPitchFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the MIDI pitch value of the last note in the piece.
    LongestCompleteRestFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates the longest amount of uninterrupted time (expressed as a fraction of the duration of a quarter note) in which no pitched notes are sounding on any MIDI channel.
    LongestPartialRestFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates the longest amount of uninterrupted time (expressed as a fraction of the duration of a quarter note) in which no notes are sounding on at least one active MIDI channel.
    LongestRhythmicValueFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the rhythmic value of the longest note in the piece, expressed as a fraction of a quarter note.
    MajorOrMinorFeature
    A feature calculator that finds whether the piece is major or minor, as indicated by the first encountered major/minor metadata tag in the piece.
    MaximumNoteDurationFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the duration of the longest note in the piece (in seconds).
    MaximumNumberOfIndependentVoicesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the maximum number of different channels in which notes are sounded simultaneously.
    MeanCompleteRestDurationFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates the mean duration of complete rests in the piece, expressed as a fraction of the duration of a quarter note.
    MeanMelodicIntervalFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the mean average (in semitones) of the intervals involved in each of the melodic intervals in the piece.
    MeanPartialRestDurationFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates the mean duration of rests in the piece, expressed as a fraction of the duration of a quarter note.
    MeanPitchClassFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the mean pitch class value, averaged across all pitched notes in the piece.
    MeanPitchFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the mean MIDI pitch value, averaged across all pitched notes in the piece.
    MeanRhythmicValueFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the mean rhythmic value of the music, in quarter note units.
    MeanRhythmicValueOffsetFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the mean offset in duration of notes from the idealized durations of each of their nearest quantized rhythmic values, expressed as a fraction of the duration of an idealized quantized quarter note.
    MeanRhythmicValueRunLengthFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the mean number of notes of the same rhythmic value that occur consecutively (either vertically or horizontally) in the same voice (MIDI channel and track).
    MeanTempoFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average tempo of the piece in beats per minute.
    MedianCompleteRestDurationFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates the median duration of complete rests in the piece, expressed as a fraction of the duration of a quarter note.
    MedianPartialRestDurationFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates the median duration of rests in the piece, expressed as a fraction of the duration of a quarter note.
    MedianRhythmicValueOffsetFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the median offset in duration of notes from the idealized durations of each of their nearest quantized rhythmic values, expressed as a fraction of the duration of an idealized quantized quarter note.
    MedianRhythmicValueRunLengthFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the median number of notes of the same rhythmic value that occur consecutively (either vertically or horizontally) in the same voice (MIDI channel and track).
    MelodicEmbellishmentsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all notes that are surrounded on both sides by MIDI Note Ons on the same MIDI channel that have durations at least three times as long as the central note.
    MelodicIntervalHistogramFeature
    A feature vector consisting of the bin magnitudes of the melodic interval histogram described above.
    MelodicLargeIntervalsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals greater than one octave..
    MelodicOctavesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are octaves.
    MelodicPerfectFifthsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are perfect fifths.
    MelodicPerfectFourthsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are perfect fourths.
    MelodicPitchVarietyFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average number of notes that go by in a MIDI channel before a note's pitch is repeated (including the repeated note itself).
    MelodicSeventhsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are major or minor thirds.
    MelodicSixthsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are major or minor sixths.
    MelodicThirdsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are major or minor thirds.
    MelodicTritonesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are tritones.
    MetricalDiversityFeature
    A feature calculator that is set to the number of different (unique) time signatures found in the piece.
    MicrotonePrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of pitched notes that are each associated with exactly one MIDI Pitch Bend message, divided by the total number of pitched Note Ons in the piece.
    MinimumNoteDurationFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the duration of the shortest note in the piece (in seconds).
    MinorMajorMelodicThirdlRatioFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the combined fraction of all melodic intervals that are minor thirds, divided by the combined fraction of all melodic intervals that are major thirds.
    MinorMajorTriadRatioFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the prevalence of minor triads divided by the prevalence of major triads.
    MostCommonMelodicIntervalFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of semitones corresponding to the most frequently occurring melodic interval.
    MostCommonPitchClassFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the pitch class that occurs most frequently compared to other pitch classes.
    MostCommonPitchFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the MIDI pitch value of the most frequently occurring pitch.
    MostCommonRhythmicValueFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the most common rhythmic value of the music, in quarter note units.
    MostCommonVerticalIntervalFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the interval in semitones corresponding to the wrapped vertical interval histogram bin with the highest magnitude.
    NonStandardChordsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all simultaneously sounding pitch groups that consist of more than two pitch classes yet are not major triads, are not minor triads and are not seventh chords.
    NoteDensityFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average number of notes per second.
    NoteDensityPerQuarterNoteFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average number of note onsets per unit of time corresponding to an idealized quarter note.
    NoteDensityPerQuarterNotePerVoiceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average number of note onsets per unit of time corresponding to an idealized quarter note, divided by the total number of voices present (i.e.
    NoteDensityPerQuarterNoteVariabilityFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates how much the note density per quarter note (average number of note onsets per idealized quarter note duration) varies throughout the piece.
    NoteDensityVariabilityFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates how much the note density (average number of notes per second) varies throughout the piece.
    NotePrevalenceOfPitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature vector indicating the fraction of (pitched) notes played with each of the 128 General MIDI Instrument patches (0 is Acoustic Piano, 40 is Violin, etc.).
    NotePrevalenceOfUnpitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature vector indicating the fraction of (unpitched) notes played with each of the 47 MIDI Percussion Key Map instruments.
    NumberOfCommonMelodicIntervalsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of different melodic intervals that each account individually for at least 9% of all melodic intervals.
    NumberOfCommonPitchClassesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of pitch classes that account individually for at least 20% of all notes.
    NumberOfCommonPitchesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of unique pitches that account individually for at least 9% of all notes.
    NumberOfCommonRhythmicValuesPresentFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of different quantized rhythmic values (e.g.
    NumberOfDifferentRhythmicValuesPresentFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of different quantized rhythmic values (e.g.
    NumberOfGraceNotesMeiFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the total number of grace notes in a piece (i.e.
    NumberOfModerateRhythmicPulsesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of beat histogram peaks with normalized magnitudes over 0.01.
    NumberOfModerateRhythmicPulsesTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of tempo-standardized beat histogram peaks with normalized magnitudes over 0.01.
    NumberOfPitchClassesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of pitch classes that occur at least once in the piece.
    NumberOfPitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the total number of (pitched) General MIDI instrument patches that are used to play at least one note.
    NumberOfPitchesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of unique pitches that occur at least once in the piece.
    NumberOfRelativelyStrongRhythmicPulsesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of beat histogram peaks with magnitudes at least 30% as high as the magnitude of the beat histogram peak with the highest magnitude.
    NumberOfRelativelyStrongRhythmicPulsesTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of tempo-standardized beat histogram peaks with magnitudes at least 30% as high as the magnitude of the tempo-standardized beat histogram peak with the highest magnitude.
    NumberOfSlursMeiFeature
    A feature calculator that The total number of notes marked with slurs in the piece (i.e.
    NumberOfStrongRhythmicPulsesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of beat histogram peaks with normalized magnitudes over 0.1.
    NumberOfStrongRhythmicPulsesTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of tempo-standardized beat histogram peaks with normalized magnitudes over 0.1.
    NumberOfUnpitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the total number of (unpitched) MIDI Percussion Key Map instruments that are used to play at least one note.
    ObliqueMotionFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction fraction of movements between voices that consist of oblique motion (the fraction is calculated relative to the total amount of qualifying transitions, including all parallel, similar, contrary and oblique transitions).
    OrchestralStringsPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all Note Ons played by orchestral string instruments (General MIDI patches 41 to 47).
    ParallelFifthsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of movements between voices that consist of parallel fifths (the fraction is calculated relative to the total amount of qualifying transitions, including all parallel, similar, contrary and oblique transitions).
    ParallelMotionFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction fraction of movements between voices that consist of parallel motion (the fraction is calculated relative to the total amount of qualifying transitions, including all parallel, similar, contrary and oblique transitions).
    ParallelOctavesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of movements between voices that consist of parallel octaves (the fraction is calculated relative to the total amount of qualifying transitions, including all parallel, similar, contrary and oblique transitions).
    PartialChordsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of simultaneously sounding pitch groups that consist of only two pitch classes.
    PartialRestsFractionFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates the fraction of the music during which no note is sounding on at least one active MIDI channel.
    PerfectVerticalIntervalsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all wrapped vertical intervals that are unisons, perfect fourths, perfect fifths or octaves.
    PitchClassHistogramFeature
    A feature vector consisting of bin magnitudes of the pitch class histogram described in the jSymbolic manual.
    PitchClassKurtosisAfterFoldingFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the kurtosis of the pitch classes after being folded by perfect fifths as described for the folded fifths pitch class histogram.
    PitchClassKurtosisFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the kurtosis of the pitch classes (where 0 corresponds to C, 1 to C#/Db, etc.) of all pitched notes in the piece.
    PitchClassSkewnessAfterFoldingFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the skewness of the pitch classes after being folded by perfect fifths as described for the folded fifths pitch class histogram.
    PitchClassSkewnessFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the skewness of the pitch classes (where 0 corresponds to C, 1 to C#/Db, etc.) of all pitched notes in the piece.
    PitchClassVariabilityAfterFoldingFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the pitch classes in the piece after being folded by perfect fifths as described for the folded fifths pitch class histogram.
    PitchClassVariabilityFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the pitch classes (where 0 corresponds to C, 1 to C#/Db, etc.) of all pitched notes in the piece.
    PitchedInstrumentsPresentFeature
    A feature extractor that calculates a feature vector indicating which pitched instruments are present.
    PitchKurtosisFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the kurtosis of the MIDI pitches of all pitched notes in the piece.
    PitchSkewnessFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the skewness of the MIDI pitches of all pitched notes in the piece.
    PitchVariabilityFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the MIDI pitches of all pitched notes in the piece.
    PolyrhythmsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of beat histogram peaks with magnitudes at least 30% as high as the magnitude of the highest peak, and whose bin labels are not integer multiples or factors (using only multipliers of 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 and 8, and with an accepted error of +/- 3 bins) of the bin label of the peak with the highest magnitude.
    PolyrhythmsTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of tempo-standardized beat histogram peaks with magnitudes at least 30% as high as the magnitude of the highest peak, and whose bin labels are not integer multiples or factors (using only multipliers of 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 and 8, and with an accepted error of +/- 3 bins) of the bin label of the peak with the highest magnitude.
    PrevalenceOfDottedNotesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all notes in the music that have a quantized rhythmic value consisting of a dotted eighth note, dotted quarter note, dotted half note, dotted whole note or dotted double whole note.
    PrevalenceOfLongRhythmicValuesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all notes in the music that have a quantized rhythmic value greater than a dotted quarter note.
    PrevalenceOfMediumRhythmicValuesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all notes in the music that have a quantized rhythmic value between an eighth note and a half note (inclusive).
    PrevalenceOfMostCommonMelodicInterval
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all melodic intervals that corresponds to the most common melodic interval.
    PrevalenceOfMostCommonPitchClassFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of notes that correspond to the most common pitch class.
    PrevalenceOfMostCommonPitchFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of notes that correspond to the most common pitch.
    PrevalenceOfMostCommonRhythmicValueFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all notes that have a rhythmic value corresponding to the most common rhythmic value in the music.
    PrevalenceOfMostCommonVerticalIntervalFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of vertical intervals on the wrapped vertical interval histogram corresponding to the most common vertical interval.
    PrevalenceOfSecondMostCommonVerticalIntervalFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of vertical intervals on the wrapped vertical interval histogram corresponding to the second most common vertical interval.
    PrevalenceOfShortRhythmicValuesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all notes in the music that have a quantized rhythmic value less than a dotted eighth note.
    PrevalenceOfVeryLongRhythmicValuesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all notes in the music that have a quantized rhythmic value greater than a whole note.
    PrevalenceOfVeryShortRhythmicValuesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all notes in the music that have a quantized rhythmic value less than an eighth note.
    PrevalenceRatioOfTwoMostCommonVerticalIntervalsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the ratio between the fraction of notes corresponding to the second most common vertical interval on the wrapped vertical interval histogram and the fraction of vertical intervals corresponding to the most common vertical interval.
    QuadrupleInitialMeterFeature
    A feature calculator that is set to 1 if the initial meter is a standard simple or compound quadruple meter (i.e.
    RangeFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the difference in semitones between the highest and lowest pitches.
    RangeOfRhythmicValuesFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates a measure of the difference between the shortest rhythmic values and the longest rhythmic values in the music.
    RelativeNoteDensityOfHighestLineFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of Note Ons in the channel with the highest average pitch, divided by the average number of Note Ons in all channels that contain at least one note.
    RelativeNoteDurationsOfLowestLineFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average duration of notes (in seconds) in the channel with the lowest average pitch, divided by the average duration of notes in all channels that contain at least one note.
    RelativePrevalenceOfMostCommonMelodicIntervals
    A feature calculator that finds the relative frequency of the second most common melodic interval in the piece, divided by the relative frequency of the most common melodic interval.
    RelativePrevalenceOfMostCommonRhythmicValuesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the relative frequency of the of the second most common rhythmic value in the piece, divided by the relative frequency of the most common rhythmic value.
    RelativePrevalenceOfTopPitchClassesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the relative frequency of the of the second most common pitch class in the piece, divided by the relative frequency of the most common pitch class.
    RelativePrevalenceOfTopPitchesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the relative frequency of the second most common pitch in the piece, divided by the relative frequency of the most common pitch.
    RelativeRangeIsolationOfLoudestVoiceFeature
    Number of pitched notes in the MIDI channel with the highest average loudness that fall outside the range of any other pitched channel, divided by the total number of notes in the channel with the highest average loudness.
    RelativeRangeOfHighestLineFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the pitch difference in semitones between the highest note and the lowest note played in the channel with the highest average pitch, divided by the difference between the highest note and the lowest note in the piece overall.
    RelativeRangeOfLoudestVoiceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the difference between the highest note and the lowest note played in the channel with the highest average loudness (MIDI velocity), divided by the difference between the highest note and the lowest note in the piece as a whole.
    RelativeSizeOfMelodicIntervalsInLowestLineFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average melodic interval in semitones in the channel with the lowest average pitch, divided by the average melodic interval in all channels that contain at least two notes.
    RepeatedNotesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that correspond to repeated notes.
    RhythmicLoosenessFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average width of beat histogram peaks.
    RhythmicLoosenessTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average width of tempo-standardized beat histogram peaks.
    RhythmicValueHistogramFeature
    A feature extractor that calculates a feature vector representing a normalized histogram where the value of each bin specifies the fraction of all notes in the music with a rhythmic value corresponding to that of the given bin.
    RhythmicValueKurtosisFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the kurtosis of the note durations in quarter notes of all notes in the music.
    RhythmicValueMedianRunLengthsHistogramFeature
    A feature extractor that calculates a normalized feature vector that indicates, for each rhythmic value, the normalized median number of times that notes with that rhythmic value occur consecutively (either vertically or horizontally) in the same voice (MIDI channel and track).
    RhythmicValueSkewnessFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the skewness of the note durations in quarter notes of all notes in the music.
    RhythmicValueVariabilityFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the note durations in quarter notes of all notes in the music.
    RhythmicValueVariabilityInRunLengthsHistogramFeature
    A feature extractor that calculates a normalized feature vector that indicates, for each rhythmic value, the normalized standard deviation of the number of times that notes with that rhythmic value occur consecutively (either vertically or horizontally) in the same voice (MIDI channel and track).
    RhythmicVariabilityFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the beat histogram bin magnitudes
    RhythmicVariabilityTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the tempo-standardized beat histogram bin magnitudes.
    SaxophonePrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all Note Ons played by saxophone instruments (General MIDI patches 65 to 68).
    SecondMostCommonVerticalIntervalFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the interval in semitones corresponding to the wrapped vertical interval histogram bin with the second highest magnitude.
    SecondStrongestRhythmicPulseFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the bin index of the beat histogram peak with the second highest magnitude.
    SecondStrongestRhythmicPulseTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the bin index of the tempo-standardized beat histogram peak with the second highest magnitude.
    SeventhChordsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all simultaneously sounding pitch groups that are dominant seventh, major seventh or minor seventh chords.
    ShortestRhythmicValueFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the rhythmic value of the shortest note in the piece, expressed as a fraction of a quarter note.
    SimilarMotionFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction fraction of movements between voices that consist of similar motion (the fraction is calculated relative to the total amount of qualifying transitions, including all parallel, similar, contrary and oblique transitions).
    SimpleInitialMeterFeature
    A feature calculator that is set to 1 if the initial meter is a standard simple meter (i.e.
    StandardTriadsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all simultaneously sounding pitch groups that are either major or minor triads.
    StepwiseMotionFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that correspond to a minor or major second.
    StrengthOfSecondStrongestRhythmicPulseFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the magnitude of the beat histogram peak with the second highest magnitude.
    StrengthOfSecondStrongestRhythmicPulseTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the magnitude of the tempo-standardized beat histogram peak with the second highest magnitude.
    StrengthOfStrongestRhythmicPulseFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the magnitude of the beat histogram bin with the highest magnitude.
    StrengthOfStrongestRhythmicPulseTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the magnitude of the tempo-standardized beat histogram bin with the highest magnitude.
    StrengthRatioOfTwoStrongestRhythmicPulsesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the magnitude of the beat histogram peak with the highest magnitude divided by the magnitude of the beat histogram peak with the second highest magnitude.
    StrengthRatioOfTwoStrongestRhythmicPulsesTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the magnitude of the tempo-standardized beat histogram peak with the highest magnitude divided by the magnitude of the tempo-standardized beat histogram peak with the second highest magnitude.
    StringEnsemblePrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all Note Ons played by orchestral string ensemble instruments (General MIDI patches 49 to 52).
    StringKeyboardPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all Note Ons played by string keyboard instruments (General MIDI patches 1 to 8).
    StrongestRhythmicPulseFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the bin index of the beat histogram bin with the highest magnitude.
    StrongestRhythmicPulseTempoStandardizedFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the bin index of the tempo-standardized beat histogram bin with the highest magnitude.
    StrongTonalCentresFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the Number of isolated peaks in the fifths pitch histogram that each individually account for at least 9% of all notes in the piece.
    TempoVariabilityFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the tempo in beats per minute.
    TimePrevalenceOfPitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature vector indicating the fraction of time during which (pitched) notes are being sounded by each of the 128 General MIDI Instrument patches (0 is Acoustic Piano, 40 is Violin, etc.).
    TotalNumberOfNotesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the total number of notes, including both pitched and unpitched notes.
    TripleInitialMeterFeature
    A feature calculator that is set to 1 if the initial meter is a standard simple or compound triple meter (i.e.
    UnpitchedInstrumentsPresentFeature
    A feature vector indicating which unpitched instruments are present.
    UnpitchedPercussionInstrumentPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all Note Ons played by (unpitched) MIDI Percussion Key Map instruments.
    VariabilityAcrossVoicesOfCombinedRestsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the total amount of time (expressed as a fraction of the duration of a quarter note) per active MIDI channel in which no notes are sounding in that channel.
    VariabilityInRhythmicValueRunLengthsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the numbers of notes of the same rhythmic value that occur consecutively (either vertically or horizontally) in the same voice (MIDI channel and track).
    VariabilityOfCompleteRestDurationsFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates the standard deviation of the durations of all complete rests in the piece, expressed as a fraction of the duration of a quarter note.
    VariabilityOfNoteDurationsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of note durations (in seconds).
    VariabilityOfNotePrevalenceOfPitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the fraction of total notes in the piece played by each (pitched) General MIDI Instrument patch that is used to play at least one note.
    VariabilityOfNotePrevalenceOfUnpitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the fraction of total notes in the piece played by each (unpitched) MIDI Percussion Key Map instrument that is used to play at least one note.
    VariabilityOfNumberOfIndependentVoicesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the number of different channels in which notes are sounded simultaneously at each given moment (MIDI tick).
    VariabilityOfNumberOfSimultaneousPitchClassesFeature
    A feature extractor that finds the standard deviation of the number of different pitch classes sounding simultaneously.
    VariabilityOfNumberOfSimultaneousPitchesFeature
    A feature extractor that finds the standard deviation of the number of pitches sounding simultaneously.
    VariabilityOfPartialRestDurationsFeature
    A feature calculator that calculates the standard deviation of the durations of rests in the piece, expressed as a fraction of the duration of a quarter note.
    VariabilityOfRhythmicValueOffsetsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the offsets of note durations of notes from the idealized durations of each of their nearest quantized rhythmic values, expressed as a fraction of the duration of an idealized quantized quarter note.
    VariabilityOfTimeBetweenAttacksFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the times (in seconds) between Note On events (regardless of MIDI channel).
    VariabilityOfVoiceSeparationFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average separation in semi-tones between the average pitches of consecutive channels (after sorting based on average pitch) that contain at least one note.
    VariationOfDynamicsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of loudness levels across all notes.
    VariationOfDynamicsInEachVoiceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviations of note loudness levels within each MIDI channel, averaged across all channels.
    VerticalDissonanceRatioFeature
    Ratio of all wrapped vertical intervals that are dissonant (2nds, tritones, and 7ths to all wrapped vertical intervals that are consonant (unisons, 3rds, 4ths, 5ths, 6ths, octaves).
    VerticalIntervalHistogramFeature
    A feature vector consisting of bin magnitudes of the vertical interval histogram described in the jSymbolic manual.
    VerticalMajorThirdPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of the music by time where at least one wrapped vertical major third is sounding (regardless of whatever other vertical intervals may or may not be sounding at the same time).
    VerticalMinorSecondsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all wrapped vertical intervals that are minor seconds.
    VerticalMinorThirdPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of the music by time where at least one wrapped vertical minor third is sounding (regardless of whatever other vertical intervals may or may not be sounding at the same time).
    VerticalOctavesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all wrapped vertical intervals that are octaves.
    VerticalPerfectFifthsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all wrapped vertical intervals that are perfect fifths.
    VerticalPerfectFourthsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all wrapped vertical intervals that are perfect fourths.
    VerticalSeventhsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction all wrapped vertical intervals that are minor or major sevenths.
    VerticalSixthsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction all wrapped vertical intervals that are minor or major sixths.
    VerticalThirdsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction all wrapped vertical intervals that are minor or major thirds.
    VerticalTritonesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all wrapped vertical intervals that are tritones.
    VerticalUnisonsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all vertical intervals that are unisons.
    VibratoPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of pitched notes that have associated MIDI Pitch Bend messages change direction at least twice in connection with the note in question, divided by the total number of pitched Note Ons in the piece.
    ViolinPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all Note Ons played by violin instruments (General MIDI patches 41 or 111).
    VoiceEqualityDynamicsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the average loudness (MIDI velocity) of notes in each channel that contains at least one note.
    VoiceEqualityMelodicLeapsFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the average melodic leap distance of each channel that contains at least one note.
    VoiceEqualityNoteDurationFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the cumulative amount of time during which one or more notes were sounding in each channel that contains at least one note.
    VoiceEqualityNumberOfNotesFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the total number of Note Ons in each channel that contains at least one note.
    VoiceEqualityRangeFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the standard deviation of the differences between the highest and lowest pitches in each channel that contains at least one note.
    VoiceOverlapFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the number of notes played within the range of another channel, divided by the total number of notes in the piece as a whole.
    VoiceSeparationFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the average separation in semitones between the average pitches of consecutive channels (after sorting based on average pitch) that contain at least one note.
    WoodwindsPrevalenceFeature
    A feature calculator that finds the fraction of all Note Ons played by woodwind instruments (General MIDI patches 69 to 76).
    WrappedVerticalIntervalHistogramFeature
    A feature vector consisting of bin magnitudes of the wrapped vertical interval histogram described in the jSymbolic manual.
